wikipedia_page.main: Len G. Choules (born 29 January 1932, in Orpington, Kent) is an English, retired professional footballer who played as a centre half. He made 259 appearances in the Football League for Crystal Palace and also played non-league football for Sutton United and Romford.

response: * Len Choules (b. 1932) - footballer, born in Orpington.
